word_mean: 湿疹：因对内源性与外源性因子起反应而发生的一种瘙痒性丘疹水泡皮炎，急性期表现为红斑，水肿，表皮细胞间浆液渗出(海绵层水肿)和真皮内炎性浸润，不断渗出和水疱形成，结痂及形成鳞屑
慢性期为苔癣化或皮肤变厚，或二者兼有，体征为表皮脱落，色素沉着和(或)脱失。特应性皮炎为皮炎最常见类型
以对称分布，多形损害，剧烈瘙痒，倾向湿润，反复发作，易成慢性等为主要表现的过敏性炎症皮肤病。

sentence.Network_en: Eczema is a common skin complaint which often runs in families.
sentence.Network_cn: 湿疹是一种常见的皮肤病，通常具遗传性。

sentence.Network_en: He has a simplistic view of the treatment of eczema.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对湿疹治疗的看法过于简单化。

sentence.Network_en: He grew out of his eczema as he got older.

she says she suffered painful eczema and skin infections on her left thigh , back and left arm that put her in a hospital for 12 days and led doctors to prescribe repeated courses of antibiotics .她说，她遭受着湿疹的非常痛苦，皮肤感染她的左大腿，背部及左手臂，让她住院了12天，医生重复给她开抗生素的药。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek ekzema, from ekzein 'boil over, break out', from ek- 'out' + zein 'boil'

entry.def: Eczema is a skin disease which makes your skin itch and become sore, rough, and broken.

means.word_mean: 1. generic term for inflammatory conditions of the skin; particularly with vesiculation in the acute stages
